description: IdNamespace defined in AWS Entity Resolution service

EntityName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z_0-9-]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

InputSourceARN.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-us-gov|aws-cn):entityresolution:[a-z]{2}-[a-z]{1,10}-[0-9]:[0-9]{12}:(idnamespace/[a-zA-Z_0-9-]{1,255})$|^arn:(aws|aws-us-gov|aws-cn):glue:[a-z]{2}-[a-z]{1,10}-[0-9]:[0-9]{12}:(table/[a-zA-Z_0-9-]{1,255}/[a-zA-Z_0-9-]{1,255})$  
Update requires: No interruption

IdNamespaceInputSource.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

IdMappingType.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: PROVIDER  
Update requires: No interruption

IdNamespaceIdMappingWorkflowProperties.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ProviderConfiguration.description: Additional Provider configuration that would be required for the provider service. The Configuration must be in JSON string format.

^.+$.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

ProviderConfiguration.markdownDescription:
Additional Provider configuration that would be required for the provider service. The Configuration must be in JSON string format.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

NamespaceProviderProperties.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ProviderServiceArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-us-gov|aws-cn):(entityresolution):([a-z]{2}-[a-z]{1,10}-[0-9])::providerservice/([a-zA-Z0-9_-]{1,255})/([a-zA-Z0-9_-]{1,255})$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

RoleArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 32  
Maximum Length: 512  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-us-gov|aws-cn):iam::\d{12}:role/?[a-zA-Z_0-9+=,.@\-_/]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Required: No

Update requires: No interruption
